Another monster game that I never got round to playing despite its reputation. Too large, too involved and too demanding of your complete attention.

I no longer crave these big strategic war games but at the time this was like the holy grail.

Bought the original in 1981 at the Gamekeeper in the Glendale Galleria. Played with my friend Charlie all summer when we were 12 years old. It was amazing but it's only useful for the memories now to me.

Played a bit of 3R back in the day and enjoyed it. Never found an opponent for this and not sure anyone plays it any more as Bruce Harper has moved on to more refinements of his system into further titles.

A rollicking good time for those who've internalized the rules. One of the best multiplayer hex&counter grand strategy WW2 games available. If you are looking for a good GAME this is your monster. Well balanced with loads of nail-biting choices punctuated by ecstatic highs and devastating lows. Prepare to lose a weekend or two conquering or defending Europe.
AH
PC version only. Lots of glitches but great game on the old CPU.
I like the look and feel of this game.
Played it only once after a ton of the original. It was great!

I despair of the reviews here that mention the length of the rulebook. As wargames go, Third Reich has always had a reputation for its high level of complexity. It goes without saying that this is not a game for everybody.

With that said, Advanced Third Reich is the granddaddy of them all. The expanded rules for air and naval combat, strategic warfare, diplomacy, limited offensives, supply rules and the use of variants add a lot of flavor to this old classic and break it out of stereotypical play. The Germans can actually do a lot more with their surface fleet. The Soviet and American force pools have been adjusted to present a much more historically accurate simulation. No two games will play the same way.

Definitely NOT for either the faint of heart or beginners. This is a game for true History buffs and fanatics who are interested in the many aspects of the Second World War in Europe.
The counters are currently MIA.

Το έχω φτιάξει όλο το παιχνίδι από το μηδέν, το έχω μεταφράσει στα ελληνικά και τα έχω ανεβάσει όλα εδώ, μέσα στο 2019.
Στους κανονισμούς και τα Παραρτήματα έχουν περαστεί εξαρχής από το μέλος του BGG, τον κύριο Camustafa (ο οποίος έκανε το ανέβασμα αυτών των αρχείων εδώ στα αγγλικά), όλες οι αλλαγές αυτών από την εταιρεία του παιχνιδιού που γίνανε από την κυκλοφορία του παιχνιδιού το 1992 μέχρι το κλείσιμο της εταιρείας του το 2000.
Η μετάφρασή μου στην ελληνική βασίστηκε στα αρχεία του κυρίου Camustafa και έγινε με όλες τις αλλαγές περασμένες αντίστοιχα σε Κανονισμούς και Παραρτήματα.

I have create from scratch all of this historic, great board game. Also, I translated the board game in Hellenic (Greek) language, search in the files area of the board game here in BGG.
